text: Bigu (ej Rasul ʙaroi musrikon): Safoat sarosar az oni Alloh ast va kase dar on rohe nadorad, magar in ki safoatgar az kasone ʙosad, ki Alloh uro ʙaroi safoat pisandida ʙosad. Az oni Ust farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin. Pas, vociʙ ast, ki safoatro az on Zote ʙitalaʙand, ki U sohiʙi tamomi mulk ast va sazovori iʙodati xolis ast. Sipas ruzi qijomat ʙaroi hisoʙu cazo hama ʙa nazdi U ʙozgardonda mesaved»
